pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detect Runs of Homozygosity and Runs of Heterozygosity in Diploid Genomes // Detection of runs of homozygosity and of heterozygosity in diploid genomes using two methods: sliding windows (Purcell et al (2007) doi:10.1086/519795) and consecutive runs (Marras et al (2015) doi:10.1111/age.12259).
